file_content.text: May the Force be with us.
This is going to be way more exciting than Jedi training.
We should get back to the Senate tower.
I'm with you to the end, but I hope it's a long ways off.
General Var Suthra's in a panic. Maybe you can calm him down.
I'll handle this. You should report to Agent Galen.
We need answers--and I see the guy who's going to give them to us. Shall we?
I'm waiting for your signal.
Go on, then. I'll wait here and think about the Jedi Code or something.
Just in time. These guys get points for courage, but we're a little outnumbered.
There's more than a few trigger-happy thugs in that docking bay.
T7 sensors indicate "more than a few" enemies = accurate assessment
The kidnappers are threatening to kill Doctor Tarnis, but they might be bluffing. I'm not even sure they have him.
Bluff or not, the doctor is in danger.
We can't take that chance.
Are they open to the possibility of surrender?
Have you tried talking?
Tried negotiating with the leader. He shot at me. Very rude.
If they don't have the doctor, they're no use to us.
Then we're wasting time.
We lost the other kidnappers. This bunch is our best shot at saving Tarnis.
So how do we handle this?
I won't risk them killing Tarnis. We'll do this the hard way.
The doctor's safety is first.
Then you shouldn't go in alone.
I say we bust in there weapons drawn and see what happens.
Let's improvise.
Give me a second to paint a target on my forehead.
I'll deal with this alone. You stay here.
There is no "we."
Don't do that. I may be a Padawan, but I know a few tricks.
I borrowed a stealth field generator from Agent Galen's office. Makes me practically invisible.
I can sneak in first, then when you attack, I'll take a few thugs by surprise. What do you think?
I don't want you getting hurt.
Sounds too dangerous.
I can handle myself in a fight.
It's a good plan.
The last thing I need is an overeager Padawan tripping me up.
You'll get in my way.
The only reason I'm still a Padawan is because of my Master. I've passed every test.
Master Kiwiiks just doesn't think I'm serious enough to be a full Jedi. But I'm working on it. Give me a chance.
I suppose there's no rule against Padawans joining combat missions.
All right, you convinced me.
Great. Now you see me, now you don't.
If you get killed, I'll be very upset.
Don't make me regret this.
Not half as upset as I'll be. Activating stealth field....
I'll get into position and attack on your signal. Let's rescue us a doctor.
Kiwiiks has you pegged. Stand down.
No. Period.
Fine. Go rescue Doctor Tarnis. I'll just stand here and be useless.
I'll use Agent Galen's fancy terminal to clear a path inside the guild's headquarters. Have fun....
Heard about your shuttle trip. Wish I'd been there.
